attributes.action: to set up without delay an evacuation programme for orphaned children of Haiti.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beg the Prime Minister to set up without delay an evacuation programme to the United Kingdom to offer homes for orphaned children of Haiti.  Reports today suggest that there are potentially up to 1 million children orphaned in the country. This is an opportunity for the United Kingdom Government and the people of the United Kingdom to undertake a truly humanitarian act and offer orphaned children a start in life.
